problems.title: Fibonacci Using Recursion
problems.description: Write a recursive function to find the nth Fibonacci number.

problems.title: Binary Search Using Recursion
problems.description: Write a recursive binary search function to find an element in a sorted array.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated sorted integers
Third line: target element to find

problems.title: Array Sum Using Recursion
problems.description: Write a recursive function to calculate sum of all array elements.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers

problems.title: Find Max in Array Recursively
problems.description: Write a recursive function to find maximum element in an array.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers

problems.title: Right Triangle Pattern
problems.description: Write a recursive function to print a right-angled triangle pattern of stars.

problems.title: Pyramid Pattern
problems.description: Write a recursive function to print a pyramid pattern of stars.

problems.title: Hollow Square Pattern
problems.description: Write a recursive function to print a hollow square pattern.

problems.title: Check Palindrome Recursively
problems.description: Write a recursive function to check if an array is a palindrome.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers

problems.title: Sum of 2D Array Recursively
problems.description: Write a recursive function to calculate sum of all elements in a 2D array.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: r c (rows and columns)
Next r lines: c space-separated integers
